page.title: 14Confirmation
page.content: Mass at the Catholic Church of St Joachims starts at 11.30am but it isn't usually dead on time. If the priest Father Walls is ready and the four alter servers are ready then we begin. On Sunday 16th June seven people made their first Confirmation. Confirmation is when children reach a certain age and they have to become an adult member of the church, but adults can be Confirmed as well. Three of the people who were Confirmed belong to P7 of Hillhead School. We all had a person who would help us to make the Confirmation, a sponsor. The Bishop came up from the Cathedral in Aberdeen to confirm us. He comes every year as we write letters to him, asking him up. After the mass we went downstairs to a room where the rest of the church members were for a reception of various refreshment and to take photos
